name: Man-Spider
description:
Small World Theme. Man-Spider! Explore the small world through the eyes of a spider and solve the mystery of why you are a spider in a lab. 

Controls:-

WASD - Forward, left, back and right.

Mouse - Look around

Right Click - Shoot web

Space - Jump

Team:-

Brandon Sparks - Level 5 Game development, Lead 3D Artist

Adam Green - Level 4 Computer Science, 3D Artist 

Alexander Jensen - Level 5 Games Development, Lead Programmer 

Ibrahim Anjorin - Level 4 Computer Science, Programmer and UI Manager

Alex Adams - Level 4 Computer Science, Lead Story Writer

Oliver Browne - Level 4 Computer Science, Sound design and Story Writer
